title: Exam Scams - Best Cheating Stories And Excuses From Around The W
description:
Everyone hates exams. And there's nothing worse than staring blankly at an exam paper knowing you can't answer the question! 

John Croucher has uncovered excuses and cheating techniques used by students around the world to avoid exams, to assist their memories or to explain poor marks. From underwear inspections to student riots, this is a collection of outrageous and often surprising stories. 

Exam Scams is hilarious reading for every student who has sat an exam and for every lecturer who has marked an exam paper.
